"Amaunators belt" was a name given to an ancient constellation associated with the Netherese god Amaunator. The proper name of this constellation is actually unknown it is only alluded to by the description "Amaunators belt", which is employed for the name of this article.
The constellation appeared over the Spine of the World mountains in summer, during the time of the ancient empire of Netheril.
An ancient text of the faith of Mystryl said that a time gate "...lies hidden upon the back of the mountains, where the ice and rocks touch the summer sky of Amaunators belt." The "Amaunators belt" was normally held to be an allusion to the constellation, and the time gate situated in the Spine of the World mountain range.
